name: Escape Room (itch) (ShawnTheSheep)
description:
Escape the room before the encroaching wall reaches you! Use WASD to move around!
This game was made in a 24-hour long game jam.

Coding & SFX: ShawnTheSheep

Music: Hitman by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3880-hitman
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
